Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: RegistrationDetailsProvider
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Lambda that gets the site name as the input string and should return a string for registration

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: AuthenticationDetailsProvider
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Lambda that gets the reader name as the input string and should return a string for authentication

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: NotificationDetailsProvider
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Lambda which allows customising the “please open app” notification title and body

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: ReaderActionCompletedHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Completion lambda which returns Reader and ReaderAction of the request reader action with `nil’ error if the request completed successfully. Otherwise, returns a non-nil error to indicate request failure

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: ReaderActionEnumerationCompletedHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Completion lambda which returns the Reader and list available reader actions with `nil’ error if the enumerate request completed successfully. Otherwise, returns a non-nil error to indicate enumeration failure

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: CredentialDeleteCompletedHandler
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Completion lambda which returns MobileCredential to delete with a nil error if the delete was successful. Otherwise, a non-nil error to indicate failure

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: SecondFactorAuthenticationTypeSelector
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: Lambda that expects a Bool and SecondFactorAuthenticationType to continue the mobile credential registration

Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.name: LogFormatter
Typealiases.html#/s:21GallagherMobileAcc.abstract: The LogFormatter callback can be used to change the log line format - Only applicable if you’re logging to a file. If you configure an externalWriter then it is up to you to format your log lines. The default LogFormatter uses the format:

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: externalWriter
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: Reference to an external log writer object.

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: fileUrl
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: The full path to the log output file.

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: async
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: If set, log file writes and rotation operations are performed on a background queue.

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: formatter
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: Formatter function which produces the output string

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: alwaysFlush
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: If set, file writes will always be flushed using NSFileHandle -synchronizeFile. Else, they won’t.

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: rotationFileSize
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: If set, the log will rotate when it reaches this size (in bytes).

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: rotationKeepCount
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: If set, the log will rotate if it survives this long (without being rotated due to file size).

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: fileEncoding
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: The text encoding used. Defaults to utf8

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: init(externalWriter:)
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: inits a LogConfiguration which will cause log messages to be sent to an external LogWriter callback

Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.name: init(fileUrl:formatter:async:rotationFileSize:rotationKeepCount:fileEncoding:alwaysFlush:)
Structs/LogConfiguration.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: inits a LogConfiguration which will cause log messages to be written to a file

Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: function
Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: The name of the function that wrote the log message

Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: file
Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: The name of the file that wrote the log message

Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: line
Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: The line number within the file that wrote the log message

Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: className
Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: The name of the class (if available) that wrote the log message

Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: timeStamp
Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: The date and time that the log message was generated

Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: withClassName(_:)
Structs/LogParameters.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: / Copies the struct but overwrites the className

Structs/SdkFeature.html#/s:21GallagherMo.name: salto
Structs/SdkFeature.html#/s:21GallagherMo.abstract: Enables the Salto BLE lock integration feature

Structs/MobileCredentialStatus.html#/s:2.name: singleFactor
Structs/MobileCredentialStatus.html#/s:2.abstract: The status of the single factor key

Structs/MobileCredentialStatus.html#/s:2.name: secondFactor
Structs/MobileCredentialStatus.html#/s:2.abstract: The status of the second factor key

Structs/ReaderAction.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: id
Structs/ReaderAction.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: The internal id of the action (for example: 1)

Structs/ReaderAction.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: init(name:id:)
Structs/ReaderAction.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Create a new ReaderAction given the specified name and id

Structs/ReaderAction.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: type
Structs/ReaderAction.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: A helper method mapping the reader action id to a user friendly enum

Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: accessDecision
Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: The access decision made by the controller on an access attempt

Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: accessMode
Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: The access mode the Mobile Reader is operating in when making the access decision

Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: isAccessGranted()
Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Function that determines whether the accessDecision is granted

Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: isAccessDenied()
Structs/AccessResult.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Function that determines whether the accessDecision is denied

Structs/MobileAccessLocalization.html#/s.name: init(notificationDetails:registrationDetails:authenticationDetails:)
Structs/MobileAccessLocalization.html#/s.abstract: Create a localization object for the SDK. Any UI shown by the SDK can be customised using this object.

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: credentialId
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: The programmatic ID of the Mobile Credential to which this Digital ID belongs

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: id
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: The programmatic ID of this Digital ID

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: activationTime
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: Time from which the Digital ID will be considered active. Nil means active from the beginning of time

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: expiryTime
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: Time after which the Digital ID will be considered expired. Nil means never expires

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: statusValue
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: A friendly description of the Digital ID’s current status (e.g. “Expired”)

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: statusType
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: A stable, programmatic description of the Digital ID’s current status (e.g. “expired”)

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: frontSide
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: The binary data for the front side of the Digital ID card.

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: rearSide
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: The binary data for the rear side of the Digital ID card. Nil means the card has a front side only.

Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: sourceSiteFacilityId
Structs/DigitalId.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: Facility ID of the site this Digital ID was received from or zero if same as the Mobile Credential

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.name: credentialId
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The ID of the credential the Salto Key belongs to

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.name: saltoServerId
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The Unique Identifier for the Salto Server the Salto Key belongs to

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.name: name
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The assigned name of the Salto Key

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.name: issueTime
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The datetime the Salto Key was issued

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.name: expiryTime
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The datetime the Salto Key will expire

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.name: sourceSiteFacilityId
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Facility ID of the site this Salto Key was received from or zero if same as the Mobile Credential

Structs/SaltoAccessResult.html#/s:21Gall.name: saltoAccessDecision
Structs/SaltoAccessResult.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: The access decision returned by the Salto SDK

Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html.name: SaltoKeyIdentifier
Structs/SaltoKeyIdentifier.html.abstract: An object that contains all the identifiers for a Salto Key but not the actual key value itself

Structs/MobileAccessLocalization.html.name: MobileAccessLocalization
Structs/MobileAccessLocalization.html.abstract: Localization object used to customize UI shown by the SDK

Structs/MobileCredentialStatus.html.name: MobileCredentialStatus
Structs/MobileCredentialStatus.html.abstract: The status of the mobile credential keys

Structs/SharedCredential.html.name: SharedCredential
Structs/SharedCredential.html.abstract: This object holds Shared Mobile Credential details

Structs/SdkFeature.html.name: SdkFeature
Structs/SdkFeature.html.abstract: Lets you enable additional features of the SDK, which are off by default

Structs/LogParameters.html.name: LogParameters
Structs/LogParameters.html.abstract: Associated information that accompanies a log message

Structs/LogConfiguration.html.name: LogConfiguration
Structs/LogConfiguration.html.abstract: Represents the configuration of the logging framework

Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: level
Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Controls the log level for this specific logger instance

Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: info(_:function:file:line:className:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Writes an informational message to the log

Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: debug(_:function:file:line:className:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Writes a debug message to the log

Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: verbose(_:function:file:line:className:)
Protocols/Logger.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Writes a verbose message to the log

Protocols/LogWriter.html#/s:21GallagherM.name: level
Protocols/LogWriter.html#/s:21GallagherM.abstract: Controls the log level for this specific LogWriter instance

Protocols/SdkStateDelegate.html#/s:21Gal.name: onStateChange(isScanning:states:)
Protocols/SdkStateDelegate.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Function called when the SDK state changes

Protocols/SdkFeatureStateDelegate.html#/.name: onFeatureStatesChanged(featureStates:)
Protocols/SdkFeatureStateDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called after a change in the current list of SdkFeatureState

Protocols/SdkFeatureStateDelegate.html#/.name: onFeatureError(error:)
Protocols/SdkFeatureStateDelegate.html#/.abstract: Called for non-stateful errors encountered during the processing of feature data.

Protocols/RegistrationDelegate.html#/s:2.name: onRegistrationCompleted(credential:error:)
Protocols/RegistrationDelegate.html#/s:2.abstract: Function which gets called once the credential registration is completed successfully. Otherwise, a non-nil error to indicate failure

Protocols/RegistrationDelegate.html#/s:2.name: onAuthenticationTypeSelectionRequested(selector:)
Protocols/RegistrationDelegate.html#/s:2.abstract: function which gets called if the credential being registered is a two factor credential

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: facilityId
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets the facility ID of the credential

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: facilityName
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets the name of the credential, some credentials can have no name (empty string) as configured by Command Centre site administrators

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: sharedCredentials
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The list of shared credentials to use with other Command Centre sites.

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: registeredDate
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets the date that the Mobile Credential was registered

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: isSingleFactor
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets if the credential is a single factor credential

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: secondFactorType
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets the credential two factor type which will be used to authenticate with

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: sessionUrl
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets the session URL. This URL is not supported for general use.

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: status
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Returns the internal status of the mobile credential.

Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.name: isRevoked
Protocols/MobileCredential.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Gets if the credential has been revoked, which happens when the credential is deleted

Protocols/ReaderUpdateDelegate.html#/s:2.name: onReaderUpdated(_:updateType:)
Protocols/ReaderUpdateDelegate.html#/s:2.abstract: Function called when a new update is received for a specific reader

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: measuredPathLoss
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: The currently measured BLE path loss between the Reader and mobile device

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: distance
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: An enum indicating the distance the reader is calculated from the phone

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: autoConnectPathLoss
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Auto connect path loss is the value at which BLE auto-connect will apply.

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: manualConnectPathLoss
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: Manual connect path loss is the value at which the UI should show and hide readers for connecting via manual connect.

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: isBleManualConnectEnabled
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: A boolean indicating if manual connect is available on this reader

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: isBleAutoConnectEnabled
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: A boolean indicating if automatic connect is available on this reader

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: isSecondFactorRequired
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: A boolean indicating if the reader will require a second factor on connection

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.name: isBleActionsEnabled
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html#/s:21Gal.abstract: A boolean indicating if BLE actions are available to use on this reader

Protocols/AccessDelegate.html#/s:21Galla.name: onAccessStarted(reader:)
Protocols/AccessDelegate.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: Function called to indicate start of an access attempt

Protocols/AccessDelegate.html#/s:21Galla.name: onAccessCompleted(reader:result:error:)
Protocols/AccessDelegate.html#/s:21Galla.abstract: Function called when an access request has completed succesfully with a result. Otherwise, a non-nil error to indicate failure

Protocols/StringValueConvertible.html#/s.name: stringValue
Protocols/StringValueConvertible.html#/s.abstract: Returns a programmatic string representation of this object.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: registerCredential(url:delegate:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Starts registration for a new Mobile Credential.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: mobileCredentials
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Gets all registered Mobile Credentials

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: getMobileCredentials(options:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Gets all Mobile Credentials from the database, optionally filtering out revoked credentials

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: getMobileCredential(credentialId:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Gets a Mobile Credential by its identifier.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: deleteMobileCredential(_:deleteOption:onCredentialDeleteCompleted:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Deletes a mobile credential.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: setScanning(enabled:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Starts or Stops scanning for readers.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: resolveInvitationUrl(_:invitation:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Build a correct format for invitation URL used typically when manually registering

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: requestAccess(reader:delegate:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests access via a particular reader and calls back to the appropriate functions on the specified delegate

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: requestReaderAction(reader:action:onReaderActionCompleted:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests an action to a reader

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: enumerateReaderActions(reader:onReaderActionEnumerationCompleted:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Enumerates the list of reader actions

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addSdkStateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Add a delegate to listen to the state of the SDK. Warnings and errors will be announced via the handler provided

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: removeSdkStateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Remove the delegate to stop listening to the state of the SDK

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addReaderUpdateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Adds a delegate for listening to updates from readers

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: removeReaderUpdateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Removes a delegate for listening to updates from readers

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addAutomaticAccessDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Add a delegate to listen out for automatic access attempts from inside the SDK

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: removeAutomaticAccessDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Removes an automatic access delegate by reference.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: isAutomaticAccessEnabled
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Allows or Prevents the SDK from making automatic access attempts.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: backgroundScanningMode
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Controls background reader scanning behaviour

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: states
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: A list of current global errors or warnings from the SDK

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: sdkFeatureStates
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Synchronously gets the feature states of the SDK

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addSdkFeatureStateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Listens to the feature states of the SDK. Warnings and errors will be announced via the handler provided

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: removeSdkFeatureStateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Removes a feature state delegate by reference.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: syncCredentialItemUpdates()
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Triggers an async request to the Gallagher cloud for related item updates for registered mobile credentials

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: syncCredentialItemUpdates(onSyncCompleted:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Triggers an async request to the Gallagher cloud for related item updates for registered mobile credentials, calling onSyncCompleted after the sync process finishes.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addDigitalIdDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Add a delegate for handling Digital IDs available to registered Mobile Credentials

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: removeDigitalIdDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Removes a Digital ID delegate by reference

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addSaltoUpdateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Add a delegate for handling Salto Keys available to registered MobileCredentials

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: removeSaltoUpdateDelegate(_:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Removes a delegate for handling Salto Keys available to registered MobileCredentials

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: startOpeningSaltoDoor(saltoKeyIdentifier:delegate:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Start opening a Salto Door with a given Salto Key Identifier using default opening parameters with ‘.standardMode’ opening mode

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: startOpeningSaltoDoor(saltoKeyIdentifier:delegate:params:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Start opening a Salto Door with a given Salto Key Identifier using specified opening parameters

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: startOpeningNextDoor(expiry:delegate:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Start opening the next (Gallagher) door we see within manual-connect range.

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: sendNotificationToken(apnsToken:onSendCompleted:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which passes nil for “forCredentials” because swift protocols can’t declare methods with optional parameters

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call authenticateCredential and provide a block as the callback handler,

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call registerCredential and provide two blocks as handlers for onRegistrationCompleted and onAuthenticationTypeSelectionRequested,

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call addAutomaticAccessDelegate and provide two blocks as handlers for onAccessStart and onAccessCompleted,

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: requestAccess(reader:onAccessStart:onAccessCompleted:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call requestAccess and provide two blocks as handlers for onAccessStart and onAccessCompleted,

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call addSdkStateDelegate and provide a block as the callback handler

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addDigitalIdDelegate(onDigitalIdUpdate:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call addDigitalIdDelegate and provide a block as the callback handler

Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: addE2eDelegate(onSiteE2eKeysReceived:)
Protocols/MobileAccess.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Extension which lets you call addE2eDelegate and provide a block as the callback handler

Protocols/MobileAccess.html.abstract: Interface to the Gallagher mobile access SDK

Protocols/StringValueConvertible.html.name: StringValueConvertible
Protocols/StringValueConvertible.html.abstract: The Mobile Connect SDK returns various error and message structures.

Protocols/AccessDelegate.html.name: AccessDelegate
Protocols/AccessDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate for implementing handlers on access requests

Protocols/Reader.html.name: Reader
Protocols/Reader.html.abstract: A simple protocol for passing around handles to readers.

Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html.name: ReaderAttributes
Protocols/ReaderAttributes.html.abstract: A protocol that documents the attributes of a reader at a given time.

Protocols/ReaderUpdateDelegate.html.name: ReaderUpdateDelegate
Protocols/ReaderUpdateDelegate.html.abstract: An delegate for implementing a handler on readers updates

Protocols/MobileCredential.html.name: MobileCredential
Protocols/MobileCredential.html.abstract: A protocol that describes the registered mobile credential

Protocols/RegistrationDelegate.html.name: RegistrationDelegate
Protocols/RegistrationDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate which helps determine the results of activating a Mobile Credential

Protocols/SdkFeatureStateDelegate.html.name: SdkFeatureStateDelegate
Protocols/SdkFeatureStateDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate for changes to the Feature states. All errors for Notifications, Salto, Aperio and Digital ID features will come through here.

Protocols/SdkStateDelegate.html.name: SdkStateDelegate
Protocols/SdkStateDelegate.html.abstract: A delegate to describe when the SDK changes in some way. Use this channel to find global errors or warnings from the SDK

Protocols/LogWriter.html.name: LogWriter
Protocols/LogWriter.html.abstract: A protocol that can write log messages

Protocols/Logger.html.name: Logger
Protocols/Logger.html.abstract: An object which represents a logging context for some area, for example, all the log messages for a given class

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: errorNoPasscodeSet
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: iOS only - This device requires a passcode to be set before we can use secure credential storage

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: errorNoCredentials
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: No credentials are available. This means that no scanning via BLE or NFC will occur i.e. you will not be able to find devices or attempt to access them.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: errorUnsupportedOsVersion
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: The operating system the software is running on is too old. None of the functionality if the SDK is available.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: errorNoBleFeature
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: This device does not have Bluetooth hardware.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleErrorLocationServiceDisabled
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Android only - Location services are disabled in the system settings.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleErrorNoLocationPermission
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Androind only - App does not have permission to use location services.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleWarningExtendedBackgroundScanningRequiresLocationServiceEnabled
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: iOS only - Location services are disabled in the system settings

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleWarningExtendedBackgroundScanningRequiresLocationAlwaysPermission
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: iOS only - App does not have permission to use location services in the background.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleErrorDisabled
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Bluetooth is currently disabled in the system settings or powered off.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleErrorUnauthorized
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: iOS only - The application is not authorized to use Bluetooth.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: nfcErrorDisabled
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Android only - This device has NFC hardware, but NFC is disabled in the system settings.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: noNfcFeature
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Android only - This device does not have NFC hardware.

Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.name: bleErrorNoBackgroundLocationPermission
Enums/MobileAccessState.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Android only - The app must be granted the ACCESS_BACKGROUND_LOCATION permission in order for BLE scanning to function in the background.

Enums/SdkFeatureState.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: errorCloudConnectionFailed
Enums/SdkFeatureState.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: Failed to connect to the Gallagher cloud

Enums/SdkFeatureState.html#/s:21Gallaghe.name: errorNotificationsDisabled
Enums/SdkFeatureState.html#/s:21Gallaghe.abstract: Notifications for this app are disabled on the device

Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.name: networkFailure(_:)
Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Failed to connect to the Gallagher Cloud, encapsulating the internal causing error

Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.name: invalidResponse(_:)
Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Something is wrong with the Gallagher Cloud. Please log and report this instance to Gallagher.

Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.name: userCancelledRegistration
Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: The user has cancelled the registration process.

Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.name: invitationNotFound
Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: The invitation is no longer available in the Gallagher cloud and it can no longer be registered.

Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.name: devicePasscodeNotSet
Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Registration requires passcode to be set on the mobile device.

Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.name: unexpected(_:)
Enums/RegistrationError.html#/s:21Gallag.abstract: Unexpected error with a message of the internal causing error.

Enums/SecondFactorAuthenticationType.htm.name: fingerprintOrFaceId
Enums/SecondFactorAuthenticationType.htm.abstract: The phone setup Touch ID or Face ID

Enums/DeleteOption.html#/s:21GallagherMo.name: default
Enums/DeleteOption.html#/s:21GallagherMo.abstract: Deletes from the Gallagher cloud and phone; Fail if the cloud cannot be contacted.

Enums/DeleteOption.html#/s:21GallagherMo.name: allowOffline
Enums/DeleteOption.html#/s:21GallagherMo.abstract: Deletes from the Gallagher cloud and phone; Continue with phone delete if the cloud cannot be contacted.

Enums/DeleteOption.html#/s:21GallagherMo.name: offlineOnly
Enums/DeleteOption.html#/s:21GallagherMo.abstract: Not recommended. Deletes from the phone only.

Enums/SecondFactorVerificationType.html#.name: biometric
Enums/SecondFactorVerificationType.html#.abstract: The phone setup Touch ID or Face ID

Enums/MobileCredentialKeyStatus.html#/s:.name: notRegistered
Enums/MobileCredentialKeyStatus.html#/s:.abstract: the key was never registered. This will be the case for secondFactor if you specified singleFactorOnly when you registered the credential

Enums/MobileCredentialKeyStatus.html#/s:.name: unknown
Enums/MobileCredentialKeyStatus.html#/s:.abstract: the SDK was not able to determine the status of the key

Enums/MobileCredentialKeyStatus.html#/s:.name: bad(_:)
Enums/MobileCredentialKeyStatus.html#/s:.abstract: there was a problem detected when loading the key

Enums/ReaderUpdateType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: attributesChanged
Enums/ReaderUpdateType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Update received when Reader is available for use or if one of its attributes has changed

Enums/ReaderUpdateType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: readerUnavailable
Enums/ReaderUpdateType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Update received when the reader is no longer available for use

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: arm
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to Arm the Alarm Zone that the reader is connected to

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: disarm
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to Disarm the Alarm Zone that the reader is connected to

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: mode1
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to set the Access Zone on the Door that the reader is connected to, to Mode 1 (which is usually Secure)

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: mode2
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to set the Access Zone on the Door that the reader is connected to, to Mode 2 (which is usually Free Access)

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: schedule
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to set the Alarm Zone that the reader is connected to, to it’s regularly scheduled state

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: armMode1
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to Arm the Alarm Zone and set the Access Zone to Mode 1

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: armMode2
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to Arm the Alarm Zone and set the Access Zone to Mode 2

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: disarmMode1
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to Disarm the Alarm Zone and set the Access Zone to Mode 1

Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: disarmMode2
Enums/ReaderActionType.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Requests to Disarm the Alarm Zone and set the Access Zone to Mode 2

Enums/ReaderDistance.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: far
Enums/ReaderDistance.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: The SDK believes this reader is far away

Enums/ReaderDistance.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: medium
Enums/ReaderDistance.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: The SDK believes this reader is a medium distance away

Enums/ReaderDistance.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: near
Enums/ReaderDistance.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: The SDK believes this reader is close to the phone

Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: access
Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Attempting to gain access (e.g. Open a Door)

Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: challenge
Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Attempting to gain access via a Mobile Reader, which requires confirmation from the operator (e.g. the Security Guard must approve you)

Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: evac
Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Mobile Reader is updating location during Mobile Evacuation

Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: search
Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Mobile Reader is reading credential to locate a cardholder record

Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: description
Enums/AccessMode.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Returns a text description of the AccessMode

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: withDualAuth
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access not immediately granted. The zone requires a second person to authenticate to gain access.

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: withEscort
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access not immediately granted. The zone requires an escort to approve visitor access.

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: grantedWithPassback
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access granted, but with a passback warning

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: grantedWithCompetencies
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access granted, but with competency warnings

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: granted
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access granted.

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: unknown
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access unknown.

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedZone
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to enter the zone

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedZoneTime
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to enter at this time

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedAuth
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. User not recognized

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedLockdown
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. The zone is locked down and the user does not have privilege to enter during lockdown

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedLift
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to enter the lift floor

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedCompetency
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Missing a competency

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedCompetencies
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Missing competencies

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedDualAuth
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to be the first cardholder in dual-auth

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedSecondDualAuth
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to be the second cardholder in dual-auth

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedNotEscort
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to be an escort for this visitor

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedTailgatingVisitors
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Visitors not support with anti-tailgating

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedPassback
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Anti-passback violation

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedTailgating
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Anti-tailgating violation

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedDualAuthRepeat
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Not allowed to use the same phone twice for dual auth

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedChallenge
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. A remote operator rejected the request

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedMobileNotSupported
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Phone is not supported

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedCannotDisarmAlarmZone
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Alarm zone is armed and user does not have privilege to disarm it

Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deniedUnexpected
Enums/AccessDecision.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Access Denied. Unexpected error

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: forbidden
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The requested action on the reader is not allowed

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: readerUnavailable
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The reader that was requested was unavailable. Check that it had not become unavailable via

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: transactionInProgress
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: Another transaction is in progress with the reader. The API only supports one reader at a time, so ensure that only one transaction is being carried out.

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: bluetoothDisabled
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: Bluetooth was disabled during a transaction causing it to fail

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: userCancelled
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The user cancelled out of a required FIDO prompt e.g. they cancelled entering their pin, or providing a fingerprint

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: remoteClose
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The reader closed the remote connection. This will likely happen in a timeout scenario, which can occur if the user did not input a pin, or the connection was flaky and was unable to communicate in the specified time.

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: secondFactorRequired
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The connection failed because a second factor was required to continue but one was not present

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: deviceSecondFactorRequired
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The connection failed because a second factor authenticator on device was required to continue but one was not present

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: openAppRequired
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The user was expected to open the app, but did not do this in the required time. The request failed after some time

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: invalidatedCredential
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: The second factor portion of the credential has been broken and the user will need to reregister.

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: biometricsLockedOut
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: Second factor is required but the device’s biometrics are locked out

Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.name: unexpected(_:)
Enums/ReaderConnectionError.html#/s:21Ga.abstract: An unexpected error has occurred when connecting to the reader. Log this and report findings to Gallagher for analysis

Enums/CloudTlsValidationMode.html#/s:21G.name: anyValidCertificateRequired
Enums/CloudTlsValidationMode.html#/s:21G.abstract: This is the default option for third parties.

Enums/CloudTlsValidationMode.html#/s:21G.name: gallagherCertificateRequired
Enums/CloudTlsValidationMode.html#/s:21G.abstract: The SDK will only allow connections to cloud servers which are known to be Gallagher servers.

Enums/BackgroundScanningMode.html#/s:21G.name: standard
Enums/BackgroundScanningMode.html#/s:21G.abstract: Scan and connect to readers while the app is running in the foreground only

Enums/BackgroundScanningMode.html#/s:21G.name: extended
Enums/BackgroundScanningMode.html#/s:21G.abstract: Scan and connect to readers while the app is running in the foreground and background

Enums/DigitalIdStatusType.html#/s:21Gall.name: pending
Enums/DigitalIdStatusType.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Where the enabled from date is in the future

Enums/DigitalIdStatusType.html#/s:21Gall.name: expired
Enums/DigitalIdStatusType.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Where the enabled until date is in the past

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deserializationError(_:)
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Encountered Invalid Digital ID data that could not be deserialized

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: addIdFailed(_:)
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Failed to add the Digital ID to the local Sqlite database

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: deleteIdFailed(_:)
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Failed to delete the Digital ID from the local Sqlite database

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: databaseLoadError(_:)
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Failed to read Digital ID data from the local Sqlite database

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: cloudConnectionError(_:)
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Failed to connect to the Gallagher cloud

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: decryptionError(_:)
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Encountered Invalid Digital ID data that could not be decrypted

Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.name: isCloudConnectionError
Enums/DigitalIdError.html#/s:21Gallagher.abstract: Utility property to easily check if this is a Cloud Connection Error, or some other kind of error

Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.name: mobileCredentialNotFound
Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.abstract: The response indicates that the specified Mobile Credential was unable to be found remotely

Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.name: notificationsUnavailable
Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.abstract: The session response indicates that notifications are not available for

Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.name: authenticationCancelled
Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.abstract: If two-factor FIDO authentication was required, the user cancelled the FIDO authentication fingerprint/PIN step

Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.name: networkFailure(_:)
Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.abstract: Cannot reach the Gallagher cloud (i.e. WiFi offline, request timeout)

Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.name: unexpectedStatusCode(_:)
Enums/CloudNetworkConnectionError.html#/.abstract: Unexpected HTTP status code returned when connecting to the cloud

Enums/SaltoOpeningMode.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: standardMode
Enums/SaltoOpeningMode.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Open a Salto Door if the user allowed access.

Enums/SaltoOpeningMode.html#/s:21Gallagh.name: officeMode
Enums/SaltoOpeningMode.html#/s:21Gallagh.abstract: Open a Salto Door and put it in office mode if the user is authorized and the lock supports office mode.

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: deserializationError(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: A Salto Key update was received from the Gallagher cloud, but could not be deserialized.

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: mobileCredentialNotFound(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: A Salto Key update was received from the Gallagher cloud, but could not be deserialized.

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: addKeyFailed(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: A Salto Key update was received from the Gallagher cloud, but could not be added to the local database

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: deleteKeyFailed(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: A Salto Key could not be deleted from the local database

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: getKeysFailed(_:message:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: A Salto Key could not be loaded from the local database

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: cloudConnectionError(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: An error occurred fetching Salto Keys from the Gallagher cloud

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: decryptionError(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: A Salto Key could not be decrypted for use

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: saltoSdkError(_:)
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: An error was returned by the underlying Salto JustIN Mobile SDK

Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.name: isCloudConnectionError
Enums/SaltoError.html#/s:21GallagherMobi.abstract: Utility property to easily check if this is a Cloud Connection Error, or some other kind of error

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_UNKNOWN_RESULT
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication but no information about the operation result.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_DOOR_IN_OFFICE
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication and door opened with office mode set.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_END_OFFICE
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication and door closed with office mode removed.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_WAIT_SECOND_CARD
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication and waiting for a second valid key for opening.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_PIN_REQUIRED
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication, access rejected, PIN required. Introduce PIN before key.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_CANCELLED_KEY
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication, access rejected and key should be deleted.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_FINGER_REQUIRED
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication, access rejected, fingerprint required. Input fingerprint before key.

Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.name: AUTH_SUCCESS_KEY_PROCESSED
Enums/SaltoAccessDecision.html#/s:21Gall.abstract: Successful authentication, key data was processed successfully. Doesn’t imply any further outcome.

Enums/MobileCredentialFilter.html#/s:21G.name: activeOnly
Enums/MobileCredentialFilter.html#/s:21G.abstract: Only active, non-revoked Mobile Credentials. Does not include Mobile Credentials that don’t have a SessionUrl (i.e. haven’t finished registering) yet

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: deserializationError(_:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key update was received from the Gallagher cloud, but could not be deserialized.

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: mobileCredentialNotFound(_:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key update was received from the Gallagher cloud, but an associated mobile credential could not be found.

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: addKeyFailed(_:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key update was received from the Gallagher cloud, but could not be added to the local database

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: deleteKeyFailed(_:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key could not be deleted from the local database

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: getKeysFailed(_:message:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key could not be loaded from the local database

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: keyFormatError(_:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key contains the wrong data format

Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.name: decryptionError(_:)
Enums/AperioError.html#/s:21GallagherMob.abstract: An Aperio Key could not be decrypted for use

Enums/AperioError.html.name: AperioError
Enums/AperioError.html.abstract: Represents Errors that can occur within the Aperio Integration part of the Mobile Connect SDK

Enums/MobileCredentialFilter.html.name: MobileCredentialFilter
